title: Donna
overview: Donna's (Alina Tomnikov) boyfriend, self-centered bassoonist André (Eero Ritala) leaves her unexpectedly after eight years of the marriage. Donna decides to ignore her grief and find the prince of her dreams. The problem is Donna is blind. Her best friend, Mira (Essi Hellén), is doing everything to help Donna, but usually only succeeds in ruining everything.
